nodes.name: API Platform meetup live @Youtube (English-speaking talks)
nodes.description:
Save the date! We are thrilled to announce a new API Platform online meetup! Join us on March 18th 2021 at 19:00 (CET) on our Youtube channel and listen to two üá∫üá∏ English-speaking talks!

We are very lucky to listen to K√©vin Dunglas, who will give an update about API Platform‚Äôs new features. We will discover the new best practices and the unknown gems provided by the framework. Follow him on Twitter: https://twitter.com/dunglas

We're also extremely pleased to have Matthew Holt giving us a presentation of Caddy Server, a fast & powerful web server written in Go supporting HTTPS natively. We will see during his talk a detailed presentation of this fully-featured server he created in 2015. Follow him on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mholt6

Talks will be pre-recorded but speakers will be live on the Youtube chat.

Don't miss any update by registering to this page and don‚Äôt forget to subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGP6SKfBAQDlEO2QZXPb_Ew
